thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 16 May 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Sanofi announes some positive Phase 3 trials for Dupixent速 (dupilumab)

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Sanofi announes some positive Phase 3 trials for Dupixent速 (dupilumab)
text:
May 16 (Reuters) - Sanofi:
* Dupixent速 (dupilumab) showed positive Phase 3 results in adolescents with inadequately controlled moderate-to-severe atopic dermatitis
* U.S. regulatory submission for patients ages 12-17 planned for third quarter 2018
* A pivotal Phase 3 trial evaluating Dupixent (速)(dupilumab) to treat moderate-to-severe atopic dermatitis in adolescents (ages 12-17) met its primary and key secondary endpoints
* In the trial, treatment with Dupixent as monotherapy significantly improved measures of overall disease severity, skin clearing, itching, and certain health-related quality of life measures
* Dupixent is the first and only biologic to show positive results in this patient population, adds Sanofi
